channel.title: GUI tutorial
channel.description:
I need a Announcment Gui sorta thing, i tryed the tutoial inthe tut section but it didnt work :/
I need it so you can send messages to server, Ban players, stuff like that, also maybe have a chat log thing that updates so i can see what going on ;)
If someone can get that would be good
